page.title: 11LEISURE IN CHARLBURY
page.content: Most people work from 9.00 until about 5.30 and then apart from home entertainment like television and videos,there are many Clubs and recreation facilities to choose from in the area. Some of these are Angling,Badminton, Bowls,Bridge,Dramatics,Folk Dancing, Singing,Chess,Cricket,Flower Arranging, Football,Hockey,Judo,Over 60's,Oxfam Knitting,Rotary,Round Table,British Legion,Swimming,Wine and Beer Making, W.I and W.R.V.S. There are also Pub "Sports" such as Darts,Cribbage,Dominoes and Aunt Sally. Aunt Sally is peculiar to this area in which you throw sticks at a small dolly and try to knock it off the holder. In the villages there are often fetes and barbecues and other things like that.The Spendlove Centre caters for certain sports.
